title: UTF-8 Latin1 Supplement

metadata.description: Learn about UTF-8 Latin1 Supplement with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Hex 0080-00FF / Decimal 128-255 If you want any of these characters displayed in HTML, you can use the HTML entity found in the table below. If the character does not have an HTML entity, you can use the decimal (dec) or hexadecimal (hex) reference. Example

I will display £

I will display £

I will display £

LETTER THORN ÿ 255 00FF ÿ LATIN SMALL LETTER Y WITH DIAERESIS C1 Controls These control characters were originally designed to control hardware devices. Control characters are not supposed to be displayed in HTML. However, because they are defined as characters, in the ANSI character set used by Windows, they might be displayed if you are using Windows. Char Dec Hex Control  128 0080 CONTROL  129 0081 CONTROL  130 0082 BREAK PERMITTED HERE  131 0083 NO BREAK HERE  132 0084 INDEX 133 0085  134 0086 START OF SELECTED AREA  135 0087 END OF SELECTED AREA  136 0088 CHARACTER TABULATION SET  137 0089 CHARACTER TABULATION WITH JUSTIFICATION  138 008A LINE TABULATION SET  139 008B PARTIAL LINE FORWARD  140 008C PARTIAL LINE BACKWARD  141 008D REVERSE LINE FEED  142 008E SINGLE SHIFT TWO  143 008F SINGLE SHIFT THREE  144 0090 DEVICE CONTROL STRING  145 0091 PRIVATE USE ONE  146 0092 PRIVATE USE TWO  147 0093 SET TRANSMIT STATE  148 0094 CANCEL CHARACTER  149 0095 MESSAGE WAITING  150 0096 START OF GUARDED AREA  151 0097 END OF GUARDED AREA  152 0098 START OF STRING  153 0099 CONTROL  154 009A SINGLE CHARACTER INTRODUCER  155 009B CONTROL SEQUENCE INTRODUCER  156 009C STRING TERMINATOR  157 009D OPERATING SYSTEM COMMAND  158 009E PRIVACY MESSAGE  159 009F APPLICATION PROGRAM COMMAND ★ +1

quiz.question: What is Control characters?
options: not supposed to be displayed in HTML
quiz.explanation: The correct definition of Control characters is 'not supposed to be displayed in HTML'.

quiz.question: What is because they are?
options: not supposed to be displayed in HTML
quiz.explanation: The correct definition of because they are is 'characters'.

summary: This tutorial covers UTF-8 Latin1 Supplement concepts and techniques. You'll learn how to use UTF-8 Latin1 Supplement effectively, including key principles, common patterns, and practical examples. By the end of this tutorial, you'll have a solid understanding of UTF-8 Latin1 Supplement and how to apply it in your projects.
